name: Alpha Project (irjayjay)
description:
A prototype for my dream game.
The idea is GTA in space, but less about heists and more about carving out an empire in the walls of this crater-city.
Currently all you can do is play a deathmatch game with your friends. Kill someone to get half their money as reward, then use that money to upgrade your ship. Here's the catch, the more you upgrade, the more your worth, the more pilots will be gunning for you!

This game is the amalgamation of 2 years of development(part time). There's still a lot else planned, but I'd like to see what the world thinks about the game so far.

Sneak peek of what else is planned: 

  • Save/Load game worlds
  • AI pilots

Follow the project:
Subscribe to my YouTube channel and join the Discord for discussions and bug-reports. We'll also plan group-test sessions where we get to all meet in-game for some deathmatch action.

Multiplayer:
Port forward UDP port 7777 on your router and get your public IPv4 from https://whatismyipaddress.com
Send this IP to your friends so that they can direct-connect to your hosted game.

Happy flying skipper!
